divs: sighting detailssitting on back patio i observed 4 live rise above the horizon to a elevation that appeared to be about the same. when they neared the same point the light all vanished. full moon out with little to no clouds...shortly (2-min) following seeing the initial 4 there where 2 additional light moving in the same direction and vanishing at the same elevation. this occurred over the gulf off or near st pete bch \ maderia bch.
Summary: At 1st there where four light asending all towards same elevation, leading up to six
